us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream
Class HL7SocketStream

java.lang.Object
  us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream.HL7StreamBase
      us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream.HL7SocketStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
HL7MessageHandler, HL7Stream
public class HL7SocketStream
extends HL7StreamBase
implements HL7Stream

A tcp socket stream object for reading and writing HL7Message objects.
